colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @040A *, ,(CES BRGYUD SDE GANG LA'ANG SBYAR CHOG PA'I SMON LAM 'DI SHIS BRJOD DANG BCAS PA 'DI NI CHOS SDE CHEN PO RI BO DGE RGYAS DGA' LDAN BSHAD SGRUB GLING DU GSANG CHAN RGYUD SDE BZHI'I DKYIL 'KHOR CHOG GI DBANG MDZOD LTA BU PHRENG BA RNAM GNYIS NAS 'BYUNG @040B BA'I DKYIL 'KHOR NYER BDUN TZAM GYI CHO GA YONGS RDZOGS ZUR DU BKOL TE GSAR DU 'DZUGS PA'I SKABS, RNAM DPYOD YANGS PA'I SLOB MA NOM CHI DGE BSGOS SOGS DON GNYER CAN MANG POS BSKUL BA LTAR, DAM PA RNAMS KYI 'BANGS THA SHAL BA DGE SLONG 'JAM DPAL GYI SUG BRIS PA BYAS SO, ,CES RGYUD RGYUD SDE BZHI'I DKYIL 'KHOR BRGYA DANG RTZA RGYUD KYI DKYIL 'KHOR CHO GA SGOS DBANG BSKUR TSUL NGAG 'DON GYI RIM PA GSAL BA'I SGRON ME ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, 'PHAGS PA DBANG PHYUG 'JIG RTEN GYI RNAM PAR SPRUL BA, GANGS CAN GYI MGON PO 'PHAGS PA CHOS KYI RGYAL PO PHYOGS THAMS CAD LAS RNAM PAR RGYAL BA'I DPAL BZANG PO'I ZHAL SNGA NAS KYI BKA' BSKUL BA BKA' STZAL SPYI BOS MNOS TE, RGYUD SDE 'DZIN PA CHEN PO SLOB DPON RIN PO CHE RNAM RGYAL DPAL BZANG PO'I ZHAL SNGA NAS, ,MJUG GI CHOG RNAMS SPYI DANG MTHUN PAR SHES PAR BYA'O, ,)
